title: MediaStream Hub
description: A Raspberry Pi-based media center for streaming and playing multimedia content.
introduction: In an era where media consumption is diverse and widespread, the MediaStream Hub offers a centralized solution for organizing and streaming various types of multimedia content. This project aims to provide an efficient and user-friendly way to enjoy media using the versatile Raspberry Pi, catering to both casual users and tech enthusiasts.

sections.title: Initial Setup and Motivation
sections.body: The motivation behind the MediaStream Hub was to create a cost-effective and easy-to-use media center. I chose the Raspberry Pi for its affordability and versatility. Initial challenges included setting up the operating system and ensuring hardware compatibility. By using Raspberry Pi OS, I was able to create a stable foundation for the project.

sections.title: Software Installation and Configuration
sections.body: Installing media streaming applications like Kodi and Plex was crucial. I faced some issues with software compatibility, but after researching and tweaking settings, I managed to get both applications running smoothly. This phase involved configuring libraries and ensuring seamless media playback.

sections.title: Networking and Connectivity
sections.body: Setting up the network was essential for streaming. I encountered Wi-Fi connectivity problems, which I resolved by adjusting network settings and using a wired connection for stability. Ensuring smooth streaming without buffering was a challenge, but optimizing network settings and using quality of service (QoS) helped achieve this.

sections.title: Adding Features and Enhancements
sections.body: To enhance user experience, I added remote access using SSH and integrated the media center with other devices. Setting up a user-friendly interface was important, so I customized Kodi's skin and set up Plex's web app for easy access. These features make the MediaStream Hub more accessible and convenient.

sections.title: Future Plans and Improvements
sections.body: Looking ahead, I plan to integrate AI for better content recommendations and improve the UI/UX. Additionally, integrating with smart home devices using Home Assistant is on the horizon. These enhancements will make the MediaStream Hub even more versatile and user-friendly.
